public ref class SecurityManager abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides the main access point for classes interacting with the security system.

span.span: Provides the main access point for classes interacting with the security system.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性會提供方法來存取及管理安全性原則組態。Security provides methods to access and manipulate the security policy configuration. 您無法建立執行個體。You cannot create instances of .

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether code must have in order to execute.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether code must have in order to execute.

value.span: 如果程式碼必須有才能執行; 否則。

span.span: if code must have in order to execute; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性是`false`，即使程式碼不含可以執行。If this property is `false`, even code without can execute. 執行檢查昂貴，而且可以排除延遲的原則解析的優點。Execution checking is expensive and can eliminate the advantages of lazy policy resolution. 這個屬性被提供來停用檢查在需要時執行。This property is provided to disable execution checking when needed. 這個屬性的變更不會保存直到呼叫。A change to this property is not persisted until is called. 新的處理序將不會受到變更之前它會保存在登錄中。New processes will not be affected by the change until it is persisted in the registry.

for the ability to modify policy.

public: static bool CurrentThreadRequiresSecurityContextCapture();

summary.span: Determines whether the current thread requires a security context capture if its security state has to be re-created at a later point in time.

span.span: Determines whether the current thread requires a security context capture if its security state has to be re-created at a later point in time.

returns.span: if the stack contains no partially trusted application domains, no partially trusted assemblies, and no currently active or modifiers; if the common language runtime cannot guarantee that the stack contains none of these.

span.span: if the stack contains no partially trusted application domains, no partially trusted assemblies, and no currently active or modifiers; if the common language runtime cannot guarantee that the stack contains none of these.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用之前您快取在成功的安全性要求之後取得的機密資料的方法。You can use the method before you cache sensitive data that is obtained after successful security demands. 如果方法更高版本上呼叫堆疊，資料應該不會快取不會擷取對應的安全性內容。If the method has been called higher on the stack, the data should not be cached without capturing the corresponding security context. 否則，敏感性下取得的資料可能會變成可供程式碼也就是不再執行，與就地。Otherwise, sensitive data that is obtained under an may become available to code that is no longer be running with that in place. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳回值時才是可靠`false`，這表示，執行緒保證不需要安全性內容擷取。The return value is reliable only when it is `false`, which means that the thread is guaranteed not to require a security context capture. 方法不需要，以避免安全性弱點的安全性內容擷取時，可能會傳回 true。The method may return true when a security context capture is not necessary, to avoid security vulnerabilities. 為安全性關鍵，因為其主要用途是為了避免不必要的安全性內容擷取時，表示使用它的程式碼有安全性顧慮，您必須稽核。 is security-critical because its main use is to avoid unnecessary security context captures, which indicates that the code using it is security-sensitive and must be audited.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.PermissionSet GetStandardSandbox (System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.PermissionSet GetStandardSandbox(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed
public: static System::Security::PermissionSet ^ GetStandardSandbox(System::Security::Policy::Evidence ^ evidence);
static member GetStandardSandbox : System.Security.Policy.Evidence -> System.Security.PermissionSet

param.name: evidence
param.span: The host evidence to match to a permission set.

span.span: The host evidence to match to a permission set.

summary.span: Gets a permission set that is safe to grant to an application that has the provided evidence.

span.span: Gets a permission set that is safe to grant to an application that has the provided evidence.

returns.span: A permission set that can be used as a grant set for the application that has the provided evidence.

span.span: A permission set that can be used as a grant set for the application that has the provided evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，主應用程式中的證據`evidence`必須包含辨識項。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the host evidence in `evidence` must contain evidence. > > 下表會傳回每個區域的權限集合。The following table shows the permission sets that are returned for each zone. |區域Zone|權限集合Permission set| |----------|--------------------| ||`FullTrust`| ||`LocalIntranet`| ||`Internet`| ||`Internet`| ||無None| ||無None| 其他的證據，例如或，列入考量。Other evidence, such as or , may be considered. 傳回的權限集合可供沙箱，執行應用程式。The returned permission set can be used by a sandbox to run the application. 請注意，這個方法不會指定原則，可協助判斷應用程式所要求的權限集合是否為合理的主機。Note that this method does not specify policy, but helps a host to determine whether the permission set requested by an application is reasonable. 這個方法可以用來將區域對應至沙箱。This method can be used to map a zone to a sandbox. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，以取得權限設定沙箱化應用程式。The following example shows how to use the method to obtain the permission set for a sandboxed application. 如需在沙箱中執行的應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 執行部分信任程式碼在沙箱中](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。For more information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md). [!code-csharp[sandboxingApis#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SandboxingAPIs/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sandboxingApis#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/SandboxingAPIs/VB/program.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets the granted zone identity and URL identity permission sets for the current assembly.

span.span: Gets the granted zone identity and URL identity permission sets for the current assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法建議的替代做法是使用執行的組件的 URL 和區域辨識項來呼叫每個辨識項型別。The recommended alternative to this method is to use the URL and Zone evidence for the executing assembly to call for each evidence type. 從傳回的權限集合呼叫識別執行的組件的來源 URL 及其區域為基礎來授與的權限。The permission sets returned from the calls identify the permissions granted to the executing assembly based on its zone and URL of origin. > [!NOTE] > 這個成員會產生代表 ECMA 公用金鑰，不是有效的密碼編譯金鑰，但虛擬索引鍵連結要求。This member makes a link demand for the ECMA public key, which is not a valid cryptographic key but a pseudo key. 在.NET Framework 中的 ECMA 虛擬機碼的連結要求會自動轉換為 Microsoft 公開金鑰的連結要求。Within the .NET Framework the link demand for the ECMA pseudo key is automatically converted to a link demand for the Microsoft public key. 安全性例外狀況根據 Microsoft 公開金鑰，不 ECMA 虛擬索引鍵。The security exception is based on the Microsoft public key, not the ECMA pseudo key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 授與權限由原則和不同的要求主體覆寫，例如判斷提示。Granting of permissions is determined by policy and is different from a demand subject to overrides, such as an assert. 此外，只測試的呼叫程式碼組件，獨立於其他呼叫端在堆疊上授與。Also, only tests the grant of the calling code assembly, independent of other callers on the stack.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.IEnumerator PolicyHierarchy ();
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.IEnumerator PolicyHierarchy() cil managed
Public Shared Function PolicyHierarchy () As IEnumerator
public: static System::Collections::IEnumerator ^ PolicyHierarchy();
static member PolicyHierarchy : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator

summary.span: Provides an enumerator to access the security policy hierarchy by levels, such as computer policy and user policy.

span.span: Provides an enumerator to access the security policy hierarchy by levels, such as computer policy and user policy.

returns.span: An enumerator for objects that compose the security policy hierarchy.

span.span: An enumerator for objects that compose the security policy hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回列舉值提供連續代表個別的原則物件 （電腦、 使用者、 企業、 應用程式定義域） 階層的層級。The returned enumerator provides successive objects that represent the policy at the respective (machine, user, enterprise, application domain) level of the hierarchy. 這些物件是即時的原則。改變這些物件可以有無法預期的結果。These objects are the live policy objects; altering these objects can have unpredictable results. 最小原則階層是由電腦層級、 企業層級和使用者層級所組成。Minimum policy hierarchy consists of a machine level, an enterprise level, and a user level. 不過，階層可以包含其他層級。However, the hierarchy can include additional levels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會叫用的安全性原則引擎，提供與呼叫程式碼識別的辨識項。This method invokes the security policy engine, providing it with evidence of the calling code's identity. 安全性原則會決定結果。The result is determined by the security policy.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.PermissionSet ResolvePolicy (System.Security.Policy.Evidence[] evidences);

param.name: evidences
param.span: An array of evidence objects used to evaluate policy.

span.span: An array of evidence objects used to evaluate policy.

summary.span: Determines what permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence.

span.span: Determines what permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence.

returns.span: The set of permissions that is appropriate for all of the provided evidence.

span.span: The set of permissions that is appropriate for all of the provided evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會叫用的安全性原則引擎，提供陣列物件。This method invokes the security policy engine, providing it with an array of objects. 傳回的權限集合代表陣列中每個辨識項來套用這些權限。The returned permission set represents only those permissions that apply to every evidence in the array. 這些權限是對等項目或原則授與每個個別的辨識項的權限的子集。These permissions are either equivalent to, or a subset of the permissions that policy would have granted to each individual evidence. 這個方法就如同您需要解決每個原則的結果上執行的交集陣列中的物件。This method behaves as if you were performing an intersection on the results of resolving policy on each of the objects in the array.

span.span: The set of permissions that would be granted by the security system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會叫用的安全性原則引擎，提供與呼叫程式碼識別的辨識項和權限集的程式碼的要求。This method invokes the security policy engine, providing it with evidence of the calling code's identity and the set of permissions the code requests. 安全性原則會決定結果。The result is determined by the security policy. 這個方法傳回的安全性系統，所要授與的權限集，並傳回為輸出參數會被拒絕的權限的集合。This method returns the set of permissions that would be granted by the security system, and returns the set of permissions that would be denied as an output parameter. 有效授與權限會授與不在拒絕的集合中的集合中。The effective granted permissions are those in the granted set that are not in the denied set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是分析指定的原則組態的辨識項的特定類型的運作方式很有用。This method is useful in analyzing how a specified policy configuration works with specific kinds of evidence. 程式碼群組將會傳回所有適用的層級的比對原則階層`evidence`參數。Code groups will be returned from all applicable levels of the policy hierarchy matching the `evidence` parameter.

exception.span: This method uses code access security (CAS) policy, which is obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].

span.span: This method uses code access security (CAS) policy, which is obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].

exception.span: To enable CAS policy for compatibility with earlier versions of the .NET Framework, use the [<legacyCasPolicy> element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).

span.span: To enable CAS policy for compatibility with earlier versions of the .NET Framework, use the [<legacyCasPolicy> element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).

param.name: evidence
param.span: The evidence set used to evaluate policy.

span.span: The evidence set used to evaluate policy.

summary.span: Determines which permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence, excluding the policy for the level.

span.span: Determines which permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence, excluding the policy for the level.

returns.span: The set of permissions that can be granted by the security system.

span.span: The set of permissions that can be granted by the security system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會叫用的安全性原則引擎，並提供與呼叫程式碼識別的辨識項。This method invokes the security policy engine and provides it with evidence of the calling code's identity. 結果由系統安全性原則，不包含任何原則。The result is determined by the system security policy exclusive of any policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會儲存原則，公開由， ，和其他類別，代表安全性原則設定。This method saves the policy as exposed by , , and other classes that represent configuration of the security policy. 除非呼叫此方法時，原則物件所做的變更將不會儲存，而且不會影響後續的應用程式執行。Unless this method is called, changes made to the policy objects will not be saved and will not affect subsequent application runs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性供[Caspol.exe （程式碼存取安全性原則工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)This property is used by the [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md) `-security` (`-s`) 若要關閉程式碼為基礎的安全性選項。`-security` (`-s`) option to turn off code-based security. 可讓系統管理員停用程式碼存取安全性。 provides a way for administrators to disable code access security. 停用程式碼存取安全性時，所有的程式碼存取需求都會成功。When code access security is disabled, all code access demands succeed. 實際上，這會授與所有的程式碼`FullTrust`。Effectively, this grants all code `FullTrust`. 停用程式碼存取安全性會略過安全性系統，以便執行程式碼可能會稍微好一點比對等的安全性原則授與`FullTrust`所有程式碼。Disabling code access security bypasses the security system so that code might perform slightly better than the equivalent security policy granting `FullTrust` to all code. 這個屬性不會停用角色為基礎的安全性。因此，要求不會受到影響。This property does not disable role-based security; therefore, demands are not affected. > [!CAUTION] > 停用程式碼存取安全性會讓系統容易受惡意程式碼的攻擊，如病毒和破壞程式。Disabling code access security makes the system vulnerable to attacks by malicious code such as viruses and worms. 停用程式碼存取安全性不會自動封鎖任何方式執行的 managed 程式碼。Disabling code access security does not automatically block managed code from running in any way. It 只會導致 managed 程式碼執行不受限制的程式碼存取安全性系統，以及應該只有在最極端謹慎執行。It only causes managed code to run without restriction by the code access security system, and should only be done with the most extreme caution. 關閉安全性，以取得額外的效能只應該已採取其他安全措施來協助保護系統安全性。Turning off security to gain extra performance should only be done when other security measures have been taken to help protect system security. 其他安全性措施的範例，包括從公用網路中斷連結、用實際方法保全電腦等等。Examples of other security precautions include disconnecting from public networks, physically securing computers, and so on. 這個屬性的變更不會保存直到登錄中呼叫。A change to this property is not persisted in the registry until is called. 新的處理序將不會受到變更之前它會保存在登錄中。New processes will not be affected by the change until it is persisted in the registry. 變更執行的處理序中的此屬性的值不一定會變更狀態以預期的方式。Changing the value of this property in a running process does not necessarily change the state in the expected manner. 若要確保變更已生效，您必須呼叫並啟動新的處理序。To ensure changes have taken effect, you must call and start a new process.
